column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My boyfriend and I split the Deep Dish Malnati Chicago Classic
column3: mozzarella cheese & a buttercrust. And we were very pleasantly surprised by the deliciousness of the pizza. I think what really stuck out was how they don't skimp on the mozzarella cheese
column4: so if you like a cheesy deep-dish you will be very happy here. And sometimes at certain deep-dish spots
column5: the crust doesn't measure up to the tasty inside
column6: but at Lou Malnati's that buttery crust is delectable.
